title: Director of Regulatory Affairs

fields.name: *Win Condition:
fields.value: * You win and exit the game when you collect 100 percentage points of enforcement revenue.

desc:
Post 4
***Issue Regulations** (1x, charge 75%)*
Choose a response restriction, described in 20 characters or less. The restriction will be announced at the beginning of the evening phase.
***Enforcement Revenue** (Passive)*
Each response which violates your restriction will transfer two tenths of their score to you. You will be notified of the total score boost you receive from this ability.
***Growing Bureaucracy** (Unlocked if you place top 3)*
Your restrictions may now be described in 30 characters or less.
***Freedom of Information Act** (Passive)*
If you score below 40%, your identity and role will be revealed to all players.
